caption.p: TUBA1C expression levels according to TCGA database. a TUBA1C expression levels in different tumor types from TCGA database were determined by TIMER (*P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001). b The expression of TUBA1C between normal and lung adenocarcinoma tissues. c Survival curve of differential TUBA1C expression in LUAD. d Multivariate Cox analysis of TUBA1C expression and other clinicopathological variables
